item.title: Deep Reinforcement Learning Works - Now What?
item.description: It’s safe to assume that deep reinforcement learning does indeed work. This is backed by recent trends which have achieved tremendous feats. An important question is â€” now what? In this post I question certain trends in deep RL research and propose some insights and solutions.
